titleStmt.title: An account of Dr. Still.'s late book against the Church of Rome together with a short postil upon his text.
titleStmt.author: J. V. C. (John Vincent Canes), d. 1672.

notesStmt.note: An answer to Stillingfleet's A discourse concerning the idolatry practised in the Church of Rome.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
